answers.answer: Try miralax. Drink some prune juice or have a cup of coffee. Miralax usually has helped me go within a day or so
I ate fiber one cereal every morning. That seemed to help
Eat apples lot of apples. It works like a charm
I always find that grape juice works well. You can also try aloe
I eat prunes about every 3 days or less and I drink 70-90oz of water a day....seems to help me stay regular. :)
I eat prunes about every 3 days or less and I drink 70-90oz of water a day....seems to help me stay regular. :)
Milk of magnesium always help. Take it at night with water. Next morning you should be good.
Chamomile tea I drink a cup every day and it's wonderfull for digestion!
I take docusate sodium everyday and it is fine with my doctor and it has helped TREMENDOUSLY plus drinking a lot of water and making sure I eat fruits and veggies
I can't eat fruit I have gestational diabetes ): I need to try prunes & teasThanks ladies.I had to strain and push so painful but haven't had crampsDrs can't prescribe anything? /:

question: 21 wks tomorrowThurs will be a week on colace& been eating like a fiber bar daily.I'm cramping so bad!!!): ): ): ): ): ):I have a cerlauge in place can't strain but og god do I have to so I can make myself fart!!Sorry tmi I hate this!!I'm so gassssyyy.How do you ladies cope??????
title: severe constipation
